name: Dicey Doom
description:
Roll the dices and blast them all !

Dicey Doom is an FPS where you roll dices to power-up your gun ! 

After each wave, you can roll the dices and test your luck for a much needed upgrade on a trait of your weapon that can either be Damage (red) , Fire rate (blue) and Bullet Speed (green).

Become unbeatable !

You can choose between 2 arenas to test your skills !

Controls:

- ZQSD for movement
- Mouse Left-Click to fire
- Shift to run (Firing is disabled while running)
- Spacebar to jump
